credit_line: Gift of Mrs. John W. Field
dimensions:
Overall: 2 3/8 in. (6 cm)
circumference: 7 1/8 in. (18.1 cm)
title: Corinthian Aryballos
description: Incised vertical bands decorate the body.  These bands are colored in either black, red or white glaze, creating the alternating bands of color characteristic of the Corinthian "black polychrome" style.
